name: Learn Python
description: Programming fundamentals for economists — data manipulation, visualization, and workflows

resources.name: The Missing Semester (MIT)
resources.why: Git, shell, debugging — skills they don't teach in PhD programs

resources.name: Python for Econometrics
resources.why: NumPy, pandas, statsmodels from Kevin Sheppard

resources.name: Python Data Science Handbook
resources.why: Free reference for NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib

name: Learn Statistics
description: Hypothesis testing, inference, and distributions — the foundation for empirical work

resources.name: StatQuest (Josh Starmer)
resources.why: Visual intuition for stats — the 'Bill Nye of Statistics'

resources.name: Seeing Theory (Brown)
resources.why: Beautiful interactive visualizations for building intuition

packages.name: pingouin
packages.why: ANOVA, t-tests, and correlations made easy

name: Learn ML
description: Prediction, tree models, and cross-validation — for forecasting and pattern recognition

resources.name: Introduction to Statistical Learning
resources.why: Free, runnable Python code, intuition first

resources.name: Andrew Ng's ML Specialization
resources.why: The classic introduction, rebuilt 2022 with Python

resources.name: Andrew Ng's Deep Learning Specialization
resources.why: CNNs, RNNs, and transformers from the master

packages.name: scikit-learn
packages.why: The go-to library for classical ML

name: Learn Causal Inference
description: Treatment effects, DiD, RDD, and IV — answer 'what if' questions with data

resources.name: Causal Inference for the Brave and True
resources.why: The best free intro with Python code

resources.name: The Effect
resources.why: DAGs that don't suck, readable and modern

resources.name: Causal Inference: The Mixtape
resources.why: Reads like a conversation, not a textbook

name: Learn Product Sense
description: Metrics, experimentation, and business thinking — bridge economics and product decisions

resources.name: Trustworthy Online Controlled Experiments (Kohavi)
resources.why: THE definitive book — praised by Jeff Dean and Adam D'Angelo

resources.name: Evan Miller: How Not To Run an A/B Test

name: Learn SQL
description: Querying data, joins, and aggregations — essential for any data role

resources.name: SQLBolt
resources.why: No setup, run queries in browser

packages.name: duckdb
packages.why: Modern SQL on your laptop, reads Parquet

name: Learn LeetCode
description: Data structures and algorithms for coding interviews — the basics

resources.name: Blind 75
resources.why: The 75 problems you need to master

name: Learn Automation
description: Web scraping, APIs, and workflow automation — collect and process data at scale

resources.name: Automate the Boring Stuff with Python
resources.why: Free, practical skills for data work
